open3DCV - A 3D Computer Vision Library

May 12, 2017

As I’m approaching to the end of my Master, I’ll organize all the codes that I’ve written and write a 3D computer vision libray for future use. I’ll try to write a post for some of the main methods, in the hope that it can help others and as a reminder to myself. The source code is here.
